title: luvamia Women's Mid Rise Shorts Frayed Raw Hem Ripped Denim Jean Shorts
features: To guarantee the quality, Please make sure your order placed from "LUVAMIA"!!!!
DO NOT SIZE UP! Material is stretchy. Size Small fits US 4-6, Medium fits US 8-10, Large fits US 12-14, X-Large fits US 16-18, XX-Large fits US 20-22.
Casual summer hot pants features mid waist, frayed detailing and raw hemline. Slightly side slit.
Zipper fly, 5 functional pockets, button closure. Slim fit, fashion and cute. Stretchy. Machine washable.
Ripped denim shorts for women and juniors. Perfect for summer daily wear, going out, night out, dating, etc
